mil.nga.giat.geowave.ingest.local

Class AbstractLocalFileDriver<P extends LocalPluginBase,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.ingest.AbstractCommandLineDriver
      • mil.nga.giat.geowave.ingest.local.AbstractLocalFileDriver<P,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - The type of the plugin this driver supports.
    R - The type for intermediate data that can be used throughout the life of the process and is passed along for each call to process a file.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalFileIngestDriver, StageToHdfsDriver

    public abstract class AbstractLocalFileDriver<P extends LocalPluginBase,R>
extends AbstractCommandLineDriver
    This class can be sub-classed to handle recursing over a local directory structure and passing along the plugin specific handling of any supported file for a discovered plugin.
